creditline: Gift of funds from Marla J. Kinney
description: recto: colorful woodblock with image of figure molding a blue pot on a potter's wheel; figure wears a pink shirt, burgundy bottoms, and is surrounded by blue and brown pots; gold brick background verso: figure wearing a wide-brimmed hat and red shirt in LLQ, holding a rod; two cows in background in a field; figure in right center pushing plow; smaller figure standing in a field in center left; rising mounds of foliage in URQ and ULQ; blue sky
markings: tag pinned to bottom of woodblock, in pencil: 44A- INDIANS AT WORK | 44B- ROSITA | CHRIS
title: Double-sided woodblock for "Rosita"
